segments.text: I'm just waiting for the moment when everything breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a play where all the tension is building.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water will eventually overflow even more dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Perhaps the boy will finally lose his balance on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of him falling, or the crash of dishes, might finally alert the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her reaction, when she finally sees it all, will be quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll be shocked, or angry, or both.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to be a fascinating transformation from her current placid state.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a peculiar mix of anticipation and dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The surprise on her face will be priceless, I imagine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost exciting to think about the eventual discovery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in for a rude awakening, that's for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor woman, she has no idea what's coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All this hidden chaos will soon burst into her awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to be an unforgettable moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
